name: Credential
description: A schema for a user's credentials.

property.name: username
property.description: The user's login name, or a unique identifier for this credential

property.name: password
property.description: The user's password, encrypted using the method specified in the 'encryption' property.

property.name: role
property.description: A the role of the user, such as 'administator', 'editor' etc.
